title: ProdEng Questionnaire Response
description: This event represents patient questionnaire response.

patientId.description: The ID of the patient aka UDP ID

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant to which the patient belongs to

writeIn.description: Other patient provided symptoms that fall outside of the pre-provided list, aka write-in symptoms

alertState.description: The alert state that the symptom report produced.

qol.description: User provided quality of life within a range of 0-100.

completedOn.description: The datetime when the survey was submitted by the patient.
